content.text: how to install taoster and taost component ?
how to install taoster and taost component ?

I'll help you install a toast component for your Next.js application. Based on your open file, I can see you're working with a Next.js project. Let me guide you through installing and setting up a toast component.

A popular toast notification library for React applications is "react-hot-toast". Let's install it and set it up in your application.

First, let's install the package:

1. You need to run the following command in your terminal:
```
npm install react-hot-toast
```
or if you're using yarn:
```
yarn add react-hot-toast
```

Now, let's integrate it into your application. We should modify your RootLayout component to include the Toaster component:
Now, let's add the Toaster component to your layout:

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- app/layout.tsx
+++ app/layout.tsx
@@ -72,6 +72,13 @@
       <body
         className={workSans.variable}
       >
+        <Toaster position="top-right" toastOptions={{
+          duration: 3000,
+          style: {
+            background: '#363636',
+            color: '#fff',
+          },
+        }} />
         {children}
       </body>
     </html>
